## ğŸ” Code Review Checklist

### General

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked my code for any console.log statements or debug code

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have checked that test coverage has not decreased

### Database & Migrations

- [ ] I have created/updated database migrations if needed
- [ ] I have tested migrations both up and down
- [ ] I have updated the Prisma schema if needed

### Security

- [ ] I have checked for potential security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not introduced any hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] I have validated and sanitized user inputs
- [ ] I have checked for SQL injection vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have implemented proper authentication/authorization checks

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] I have optimized database queries
- [ ] I have avoided N+1 query problems
- [ ] I have implemented appropriate caching if needed

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated API documentation if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated package.json if needed
- [ ] I have run `npm audit` to check for vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have documented why new dependencies were added
